Entries.DialogueText: I don't know you. Why are you talking to me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't know you. Why are you talking to me?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, is it my birthday? I was hoping I'd forget.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, is it my birthday? I was hoping I'd forget.

Entries.DialogueText: This is actually really nice, though. Thank you. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is actually really nice, though. Thank you.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, is it my birthday? That's right... I almost forgot. Thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, is it my birthday? That's right... I almost forgot. Thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't have to go into work today, so I'm not complaining...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't have to go into work today, so I'm not complaining...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, there's some kind of weird weather today? I didn't notice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, there's some kind of weird weather today? I didn't notice.

Entries.DialogueText: Heh... thanks. Tastes just like beer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Heh... thanks. Tastes just like beer.

Entries.DialogueText: Um... sure.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... sure.

Entries.DialogueText: I'd better stop eating...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'd better stop eating...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you made it? *squish*... Um... *smack*... I think I'll stick to frozen pizza. But thanks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you made it? *squish*... Um... *smack*... I think I'll stick to frozen pizza. But thanks.

Entries.DialogueText: Have you tried the new Joja Bubblerito? I ate two in one sitting yesterday, that was a mistake...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Have you tried the new Joja Bubblerito? I ate two in one sitting yesterday, that was a mistake...

Entries.DialogueText: I... wasn't really expecting this, after all I've put you through...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I... wasn't really expecting this, after all I've put you through...

Entries.DialogueText: I think I might be the luckiest guy in the world... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think I might be the luckiest guy in the world...

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry you had to see me like that, {Farmer_Name}... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry you had to see me like that, ...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm trying to cut back on the drinks... it's not going to be easy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm trying to cut back on the drinks... it's not going to be easy.

Entries.DialogueText: Buh... hope the bar's open.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Buh... hope the bar's open.

Entries.DialogueText: Welp... got my year's supply of Vitamin D. Now I can play video games with the blinds shut the rest of the year.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Welp... got my year's supply of Vitamin D. Now I can play video games with the blinds shut the rest of the year.

Entries.DialogueText: That's right... I'm not wearing any shoes or socks.
Entries.DisplayPattern: That's right... I'm not wearing any shoes or socks.

Entries.DialogueText: Some call it a public health risk.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some call it a public health risk.

Entries.DialogueText: The crabs seem to enjoy it, though. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The crabs seem to enjoy it, though.

Entries.DialogueText: Hoo... Feels good to rest these hams.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hoo... Feels good to rest these hams.

Entries.DialogueText: If anyone needs me, I'll just be sitting here, marinating.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If anyone needs me, I'll just be sitting here, marinating.

Entries.DialogueText: Phew... feels good to have a cold drink...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Phew... feels good to have a cold drink...

Entries.DialogueText: Or maybe a few...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Or maybe a few...

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, this sand is piping hot. I regret not wearing shoes. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, this sand is piping hot. I regret not wearing shoes.

Entries.DialogueText: Dance? Hoo-boy. Okay... let me chug a few more of these first...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Dance? Hoo-boy. Okay... let me chug a few more of these first...

Entries.DialogueText: ...No. {Portrait:Sad}
I heard you built Pam a house... That's really generous...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard you built Pam a house... That's really generous...

Entries.DialogueText: You know, I could use a hundred thousand gold myself...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You know, I could use a hundred thousand gold myself...

Entries.DialogueText: *ahem* ...ah ...Just kidding. ...Heh.
Entries.DisplayPattern: *ahem* ...ah ...Just kidding. ...Heh.

Entries.DialogueText: I heard someone bought Pam a house... *sigh*... What did Pam ever do to earn that kind of generosity??
Entries.DisplayPattern: I heard someone bought Pam a house... *sigh*... What did Pam ever do to earn that kind of generosity??

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Angry}
...Leave me alone. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Leave me alone.

Entries.DialogueText: *gulp* Oh... Yeah, okay... I guess I should've seen this coming. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gulp* Oh... Yeah, okay... I guess I should've seen this coming.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll... uh... guess I'll see you at the Saloon.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll... uh... guess I'll see you at the Saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: Shane has a glazed look in his eye. He won't speak to you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane has a glazed look in his eye. He won't speak to you.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't understand you... *sigh*...
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't understand you... *sigh*...

Entries.DialogueText: I hardly know you. Why are you talking to me?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hardly know you. Why are you talking to me?

Entries.DialogueText: What's the point of talking to me? I don't want any friends.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's the point of talking to me? I don't want any friends.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. Sorry if I came off as rude when we first met.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. Sorry if I came off as rude when we first met.

Entries.DialogueText: It takes me a while to warm up to strangers.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It takes me a while to warm up to strangers.

Entries.DialogueText: It's a lot of effort to be friends with someone. It's easier to just be alone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's a lot of effort to be friends with someone. It's easier to just be alone.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be honest, I still can't understand why you'd want to be friends with me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be honest, I still can't understand why you'd want to be friends with me.

Entries.DialogueText: Life isn't fair, and I can't help but feel bitter about it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Life isn't fair, and I can't help but feel bitter about it.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever feel like the whole world is scrutinizing you like some disgusting insect?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever feel like the whole world is scrutinizing you like some disgusting insect?

Entries.DialogueText: What? What do you want? Go away.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What? What do you want? Go away.

Entries.DialogueText: What do you want from me? Money? I'd give you a pot of gold to leave me alone!
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you want from me? Money? I'd give you a pot of gold to leave me alone!

Entries.DialogueText: Every time I try something new it goes horribly wrong. You learn to just stay in a shell.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Every time I try something new it goes horribly wrong. You learn to just stay in a shell.

Entries.DialogueText: Life isn't so bad... at least I have frozen pizza and eggs. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Life isn't so bad... at least I have frozen pizza and eggs.

Entries.DialogueText: We should go to a Tunnelers game some time. When I go by myself, I usually drink way too much beer.
Entries.DisplayPattern: We should go to a Tunnelers game some time. When I go by myself, I usually drink way too much beer.

Entries.DialogueText: I need to keep it together for Jas' sake. I don't want to be a bad role model for her.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I need to keep it together for Jas' sake. I don't want to be a bad role model for her.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm kind of like a father figure to Jas. I just hope I haven't let her down too much. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm kind of like a father figure to Jas. I just hope I haven't let her down too much.

Entries.DialogueText: No, I don't have time to chat with you.
Entries.DisplayPattern: No, I don't have time to chat with you.

Entries.DialogueText: I guess I've grown attached to Marnie and Jas. We're a ragtag bunch but it kind of feels like a weird family.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I guess I've grown attached to Marnie and Jas. We're a ragtag bunch but it kind of feels like a weird family.

Entries.DialogueText: I never really had much of a family as a kid. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I never really had much of a family as a kid.

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh* ...Every day is the same. Stocking those horrible shelves, going to the saloon, tossing and turning all night. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh* ...Every day is the same. Stocking those horrible shelves, going to the saloon, tossing and turning all night.

Entries.DialogueText: I hated my job at JojaMart, but now that I'm unemployed I feel even worse. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I hated my job at JojaMart, but now that I'm unemployed I feel even worse.

Entries.DialogueText: What do you want? Leave me alone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you want? Leave me alone.

Entries.DialogueText: You're really persistent. I guess I'm just surprised that anyone would be interested in talking to me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're really persistent. I guess I'm just surprised that anyone would be interested in talking to me.

Entries.DialogueText: Buh... Where's the Joja Cola?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Buh... Where's the Joja Cola?

Entries.DialogueText: Why try? Life's just a roll of the dice.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why try? Life's just a roll of the dice.

Entries.DialogueText: When they rolled mine, the dice fell off the table.
Entries.DisplayPattern: When they rolled mine, the dice fell off the table.

Entries.DialogueText: You like talking to me? I guess I believe you... maybe you're as weird as I am. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You like talking to me? I guess I believe you... maybe you're as weird as I am.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't you have work to do?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't you have work to do?

Entries.DialogueText: Shane's hard at work. He doesn't seem interested in talking.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Shane's hard at work. He doesn't seem interested in talking.

Entries.DialogueText: What's the point of life if all you do is work?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's the point of life if all you do is work?

Entries.DialogueText: I haven't been able to pay my rent, but Marnie's letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I haven't been able to pay my rent, but Marnie's letting me stay anyway. I'm lucky.

Entries.DialogueText: I'll definitely be going to the saloon tonight. What else is there to do?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll definitely be going to the saloon tonight. What else is there to do?

Entries.DialogueText: Buh... Can you imagine how disgusting my liver must look? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Buh... Can you imagine how disgusting my liver must look?

Entries.DialogueText: My body feels twenty years older than it should... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My body feels twenty years older than it should...

Entries.DialogueText: My body hurts a lot less since I cut back on the booze.
Entries.DisplayPattern: My body hurts a lot less since I cut back on the booze.

Entries.DialogueText: But it still feels like I'm always teetering on the edge... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But it still feels like I'm always teetering on the edge...

Entries.DialogueText: Why are you bothering me? I want to be alone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why are you bothering me? I want to be alone.

Entries.DialogueText: # {Portrait:Happy} ShaneJOSH
Entries.DisplayPattern: # ShaneJOSH

Entries.DialogueText: I'm surprised that you're still trying to make friends with me. Haven't I been rude enough to you yet?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm surprised that you're still trying to make friends with me. Haven't I been rude enough to you yet?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*...

Entries.DialogueText: I'm renting my room from Marnie at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm renting my room from Marnie at a really good price. It's small but I can't complain.

Entries.DialogueText: If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I could reset my life maybe I'd start a chicken farm. Only free-range eggs of course.

Entries.DialogueText: I've really grown attached to Marnie's chickens. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've really grown attached to Marnie's chickens.

Entries.DialogueText: A chicken will never let you down. Humans, on the other hand...
Entries.DisplayPattern: A chicken will never let you down. Humans, on the other hand...

Entries.DialogueText: Your farm seems like a great place to raise chickens. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Your farm seems like a great place to raise chickens.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm busy, can't you tell?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm busy, can't you tell?

Entries.DialogueText: ...I don't feel like talking to anyone.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I don't feel like talking to anyone.

Entries.DialogueText: You again? How many times do I have to tell you to leave me alone? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You again? How many times do I have to tell you to leave me alone?

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... it's %time. Should I throw a frozen pizza in the microwave, or should I wait? {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... it's . Should I throw a frozen pizza in the microwave, or should I wait?

Entries.DialogueText: If the Tunnelers win, I'll knock back a cold one to celebrate.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If the Tunnelers win, I'll knock back a cold one to celebrate.

Entries.DialogueText: If they lose? I'll have a cold one to drown my sorrows.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If they lose? I'll have a cold one to drown my sorrows.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I think I might be gaining weight. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I think I might be gaining weight.

Entries.DialogueText: If I watch more TV maybe I can forget about life. That would be relaxing. {Portrait:Unique}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I watch more TV maybe I can forget about life. That would be relaxing.

Entries.DialogueText: Hi, {Farmer_Name}. I've actually been having a pretty good day so far. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hi, . I've actually been having a pretty good day so far.

Entries.DialogueText: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elliott for advice next time I see him at the saloon. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay... that'll require a great script. Maybe I'll ask Elliott for advice next time I see him at the saloon.

Entries.DialogueText: Sounds great. I'll have to create a bunch of practical effects to make it look cool.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sounds great. I'll have to create a bunch of practical effects to make it look cool.

Entries.DialogueText: I didn't know you were such a miser... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I didn't know you were such a miser...

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, Dad... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, Dad...

Entries.DialogueText: Okay, Mom... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Okay, Mom...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, wow... {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, wow...

Entries.DialogueText: ...Yeah, me too.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Yeah, me too.

Entries.DialogueText: I know... that's why I stopped by, to tell you about it.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I know... that's why I stopped by, to tell you about it.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow, it was that serious, huh? I can hardly remember...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow, it was that serious, huh? I can hardly remember...

Entries.DialogueText: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh yeah? I guess that makes sense.

Entries.DialogueText: Me? I get bored with Pelican Town sometimes.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Me? I get bored with Pelican Town sometimes.

Entries.DialogueText: But... I like that you're different. We balance each other out. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: But... I like that you're different. We balance each other out.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh really? I'm surprised... Didn't you move to Stardew Valley to escape the noise of the city? {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh really? I'm surprised... Didn't you move to Stardew Valley to escape the noise of the city?

Entries.DialogueText: I mean... Don't get me wrong, I totally understand. My life in Pelican Town is pretty bland, you know.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I mean... Don't get me wrong, I totally understand. My life in Pelican Town is pretty bland, you know.

Entries.DialogueText: Part of me is wondering if this isn't all some elaborate prank.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Part of me is wondering if this isn't all some elaborate prank.

Entries.DialogueText: I can't believe you'd actually want to marry someone like me.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I can't believe you'd actually want to marry someone like me.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}... My head's spinning, and I haven't even had a beer today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ... My head's spinning, and I haven't even had a beer today.

Entries.DialogueText: ...Do you still love me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...Do you still love me?

Entries.DialogueText: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *sigh*... Maybe we got married too young.

Entries.DialogueText: Are you still happy with me? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you still happy with me?

Entries.DialogueText: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Did I do something wrong? You've been acting different lately.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you ever wonder what else is out there? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you ever wonder what else is out there?

Entries.DialogueText: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Look, I just want to be alone. Why don't you go outside and do your own thing for a while?

Entries.DialogueText: What do you want? You sound like Marnie on one of her bad days. Go away. {Portrait:Angry}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What do you want? You sound like Marnie on one of her bad days. Go away.

Entries.DialogueText: Farm-life is actually really boring. What am I doing here? {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Farm-life is actually really boring. What am I doing here?

Entries.DialogueText: Yeah... *hic* ... Sure, honey. Whatever you say... *hic*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Yeah... *hic* ... Sure, honey. Whatever you say... *hic*

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if I could've done better. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if I could've done better.

Entries.DialogueText: Hmm... I might have to buy a few cases of pumpkin ale to celebrate the season... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hmm... I might have to buy a few cases of pumpkin ale to celebrate the season...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll be helping Marnie with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll be helping Marnie with the animals at tomorrow's fair, like usual. You should just kick back and have some fun.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm starting to really feel my age... and I'm not comfortable with that at all.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm starting to really feel my age... and I'm not comfortable with that at all.

Entries.DialogueText: Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Should we go to the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night?

Entries.DialogueText: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter's just around the corner. We need to double check the heating system, turn off the valves, and check all the insulation in the house.

Entries.DialogueText: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Don't worry, I'll take care of it all.

Entries.DialogueText: I think there might be a new species of fungus growing behind my mini-fridge.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I think there might be a new species of fungus growing behind my mini-fridge.

Entries.DialogueText: Ah well, 'tis the season, right?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah well, 'tis the season, right?

Entries.DialogueText: I'm going to go out today, alright?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm going to go out today, alright?

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry if I'm sweaty... That was quite a walk... Buh, I'm out of shape. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry if I'm sweaty... That was quite a walk... Buh, I'm out of shape.

Entries.DialogueText: *Sniff*... *sniff*... mmm... what's that wonderful fragrance you're wearing? Eau de pepperoni? {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *Sniff*... *sniff*... mmm... what's that wonderful fragrance you're wearing? Eau de pepperoni?

Entries.DialogueText: You're a lot better-looking than me, you know that? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You're a lot better-looking than me, you know that?

Entries.DialogueText: The name 'Shane' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The name 'Shane' means 'Gift from Yoba'... What a joke.

Entries.DialogueText: I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnelers won big last night. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm in a great mood today... The Tunnelers won big last night.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, if I ever seem cranky, just ignore it. I get in weird moods sometimes, but it's not about you... okay?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, if I ever seem cranky, just ignore it. I get in weird moods sometimes, but it's not about you... okay?

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... life on the farm sure beats working at Joja. That place was disgusting. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... life on the farm sure beats working at Joja. That place was disgusting.

Entries.DialogueText: You think it was depressing out front? Kid, you should've seen the back room...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You think it was depressing out front? Kid, you should've seen the back room...

Entries.DialogueText: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a guy could need. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah... this is the life. No responsibilities, Tunnelers game tonight, fridge stocked with all the goodies a guy could need.

Entries.DialogueText: {Farmer_Name}? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ? I just want to say that I appreciate all the hard work you do for our household.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't really feel like doing work today. Maybe I'll see what's on TV.

Entries.DialogueText: Huh... You're wondering why I have this goofy grin on my face? You really have a short memory span, don't you? *blush* {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Huh... You're wondering why I have this goofy grin on my face? You really have a short memory span, don't you? *blush*

Entries.DialogueText: Buh... sometimes life feels like a slow, gray blur... know what I mean?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Buh... sometimes life feels like a slow, gray blur... know what I mean?

Entries.DialogueText: Hey. Take this... I put a bit too much in the microwave. [195 215 206]
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey. Take this... I put a bit too much in the microwave.

Entries.DialogueText: Sorry if it's squishy.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Sorry if it's squishy.

Entries.DialogueText: Do me a favor... when I pass away, use my dust to fertilize some corn for the hens.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do me a favor... when I pass away, use my dust to fertilize some corn for the hens.

Entries.DialogueText: *smooch*... Mmm, it tastes like someone's been nibbling on pizza rolls. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *smooch*... Mmm, it tastes like someone's been nibbling on pizza rolls.

Entries.DialogueText: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky guy. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I may keep to myself a lot, and I may seem unhappy sometimes... but I do appreciate all the work you do. I'm a lucky guy.

Entries.DialogueText: There's something special in the air... *sniff*... what is that? Oh...
Entries.DisplayPattern: There's something special in the air... *sniff*... what is that? Oh...

Entries.DialogueText: It's just this old corn chip I put in my pocket a few weeks ago. *crunch*
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's just this old corn chip I put in my pocket a few weeks ago. *crunch*

Entries.DialogueText: I'm just gonna have a couple more beers before closing my eyes for the night.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm just gonna have a couple more beers before closing my eyes for the night.

Entries.DialogueText: If... If only... ah, I was just thinking back on the glory days, when I played gridball on the varsity team. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: If... If only... ah, I was just thinking back on the glory days, when I played gridball on the varsity team.

Entries.DialogueText: Now I'm old and weak, though...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Now I'm old and weak, though...

Entries.DialogueText: Ughh... *gurgle*... I feel a little bloated... oof... too much Joja all-purpose dipping sauce.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ughh... *gurgle*... I feel a little bloated... oof... too much Joja all-purpose dipping sauce.

Entries.DialogueText: Buh... I wish I was six inches taller and a whole lot smarter...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Buh... I wish I was six inches taller and a whole lot smarter...

Entries.DialogueText: You like me for who I am? I still have a hard time understanding that...
Entries.DisplayPattern: You like me for who I am? I still have a hard time understanding that...

Entries.DialogueText: I spent all day watching TV and now my legs feel like soft dough. Guess I'll have to take it easy until tomorrow.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I spent all day watching TV and now my legs feel like soft dough. Guess I'll have to take it easy until tomorrow.

Entries.DialogueText: How was your day? Mine actually went pretty well.
Entries.DisplayPattern: How was your day? Mine actually went pretty well.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, do you need something from me? Sorry, I'm kind of busy at the moment.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, do you need something from me? Sorry, I'm kind of busy at the moment.

Entries.DialogueText: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Do you think your grandpa would be proud of the work we've done?

Entries.DialogueText: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why don't you tell me about your day when we're in bed tonight? I'm kind of busy right now...

Entries.DialogueText: Working at Joja was a drag, but at least I got to interact with people occasionally.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Working at Joja was a drag, but at least I got to interact with people occasionally.

Entries.DialogueText: What, you want me to clean the dishes? I'll do it... eventually...
Entries.DisplayPattern: What, you want me to clean the dishes? I'll do it... eventually...

Entries.DialogueText: Are we doing okay on money? I don't want to have to go back to work at Joja.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are we doing okay on money? I don't want to have to go back to work at Joja.

Entries.DialogueText: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I'm happy in the company of the TV and a couple of tall boys.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If you need to go see your friends in town, go ahead. I'm happy in the company of the TV and a couple of tall boys.

Entries.DialogueText: I don't really feel like doing anything today.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't really feel like doing anything today.

Entries.DialogueText: Ugh... clean, clean, clean. Sweep, sweep, sweep. Bathe. Cook. Make the bed... Oh, well. Life's alright.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ugh... clean, clean, clean. Sweep, sweep, sweep. Bathe. Cook. Make the bed... Oh, well. Life's alright.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder if we'll live here our entire lives?

Entries.DialogueText: It's the perfect home for you hens... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: It's the perfect home for you hens...

Entries.DialogueText: We'll have the best eggs in the whole valley! {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We'll have the best eggs in the whole valley!

Entries.DialogueText: Fresh and healthy, with rich golden yolks. Not like those pale, sickly Joja eggs... {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fresh and healthy, with rich golden yolks. Not like those pale, sickly Joja eggs...

Entries.DialogueText: ...*sigh*... {Portrait:Custom:9}
...You know, Charlie... I was thinking... {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...You know, Charlie... I was thinking...

Entries.DialogueText: A guy like me is always teetering on the edge of despair... know what I mean? {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: A guy like me is always teetering on the edge of despair... know what I mean?

Entries.DialogueText: ...But you and the other hens are going to keep me upright from now on... I know it. {Portrait:Custom:9}
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...But you and the other hens are going to keep me upright from now on... I know it.

Entries.DialogueText: ... {Portrait:Custom:9}
What's wrong... too much pressure? *chuckle* {Portrait:Custom:8}
Entries.DisplayPattern: What's wrong... too much pressure? *chuckle*

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, {Farmer_Name}... so, what do you think? {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, ... so, what do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: My special blue hens... I've been raising them in secret for the last few months. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: My special blue hens... I've been raising them in secret for the last few months.

Entries.DialogueText: I... Well, I won't be living here forever, and I wanted to pass something on to Jas. I've been teaching her how to care for them. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I... Well, I won't be living here forever, and I wanted to pass something on to Jas. I've been teaching her how to care for them.

Entries.DialogueText: ...I want to feel like I'm not just a leech on the world. I want to contribute somehow, even in a small way like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: ...I want to feel like I'm not just a leech on the world. I want to contribute somehow, even in a small way like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, there you are! {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, there you are!

Entries.DialogueText: I'm glad you decided to come. We should get going... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm glad you decided to come. We should get going...

Entries.DialogueText: We're almost there...
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're almost there...

Entries.DialogueText: *gulp* ...pre-game nerves... {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *gulp* ...pre-game nerves...

Entries.DialogueText: Here, I got you another cold one...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Here, I got you another cold one...

Entries.DialogueText: Hey, I've been meaning to say... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Hey, I've been meaning to say...

Entries.DialogueText: Thanks for sticking with me through everything... my anxiety, depression... you know... {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Thanks for sticking with me through everything... my anxiety, depression... you know...

Entries.DialogueText: You've been a really good friend to me. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You've been a really good friend to me.

Entries.DialogueText: Anyway... it's your first gridball game, huh?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Anyway... it's your first gridball game, huh?

Entries.DialogueText: Well, what do you think?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, what do you think?

Entries.DialogueText: Noisy... It makes me appreciate how peaceful it is back home.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Noisy... It makes me appreciate how peaceful it is back home.

Entries.DialogueText: Fun... Pelican Town seems really boring in comparison.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Fun... Pelican Town seems really boring in comparison.

Entries.DialogueText: Gahh!! Look, the Tunnelers are on the attack! {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Gahh!! Look, the Tunnelers are on the attack!

Entries.DialogueText: Goal!!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Goal!!

Entries.DialogueText: Oh!... {Portrait:Custom:10}
Um... Sorry... I got carried away there. {Portrait:Custom:10}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Um... Sorry... I got carried away there.

Entries.DialogueText: Maybe I had one too many...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Maybe I had one too many...

Entries.DialogueText: Well... that was definitely a good game. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well... that was definitely a good game.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, yeah... and we won, too. {Portrait:Love}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, yeah... and we won, too.

Entries.DialogueText: Well... see you soon. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well... see you soon.

Entries.DialogueText: I really loved that heavy breakdown at the end.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really loved that heavy breakdown at the end.

Entries.DialogueText: I really enjoyed that bass part.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I really enjoyed that bass part.

Entries.DialogueText: I really loved that heavy breakdown at the end.

Entries.DialogueText: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.
Entries.DisplayPattern: All these animals are friendly and love to get massaged.

Entries.DialogueText: The animals have been given their favorite foods, so they're happy. {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: The animals have been given their favorite foods, so they're happy.

Entries.DialogueText: Feel free to pet them, they won't bite.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Feel free to pet them, they won't bite.

Entries.DialogueText: I might ask you to watch the animals soon so I can grab some food. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I might ask you to watch the animals soon so I can grab some food.

Entries.DialogueText: Why is there no more pumpkin ale?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why is there no more pumpkin ale?

Entries.DialogueText: You gotta stay close to me, Jas. Don't run off!%noturn {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: You gotta stay close to me, Jas. Don't run off!

Entries.DialogueText: I talked Marnie into letting me take Jas into the maze. I think she's old enough. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I talked Marnie into letting me take Jas into the maze. I think she's old enough.

Entries.DialogueText: We're going very slow, though. Go ahead without us! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: We're going very slow, though. Go ahead without us!

Entries.DialogueText: Our hens have been working overtime to prepare for this festival.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Our hens have been working overtime to prepare for this festival.

Entries.DialogueText: They deserve the best tonight... bowls full of sweet yellow corn! {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: They deserve the best tonight... bowls full of sweet yellow corn!

Entries.DialogueText: Some of these eggs were laid just this morning. See? They're still warm!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Some of these eggs were laid just this morning. See? They're still warm!

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm... excellent sauce. *slurp*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... excellent sauce. *slurp*

Entries.DialogueText: Ah, this green stuff is spicy! *munch*
Entries.DisplayPattern: Ah, this green stuff is spicy! *munch*

Entries.DialogueText: *crunch* ...ow. {Portrait:Sad}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *crunch* ...ow.

Entries.DialogueText: I couldn't find any clean shirts so this one has to do. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I couldn't find any clean shirts so this one has to do.

Entries.DialogueText: *burp* I might've eaten too much to dance... sorry. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: *burp* I might've eaten too much to dance... sorry.

Entries.DialogueText: Wow... you don't get hot pepper chutney like this in the big city...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Wow... you don't get hot pepper chutney like this in the big city...

Entries.DialogueText: I'll never turn down free food.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'll never turn down free food.

Entries.DialogueText: Mmm... that roast smells good. {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Mmm... that roast smells good.

Entries.DialogueText: The jellies were here a year ago, and they'll be back again a year from now... nature is amazing.
Entries.DisplayPattern: The jellies were here a year ago, and they'll be back again a year from now... nature is amazing.

Entries.DialogueText: I wonder how many will show up this year? {Portrait:Neutral}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I wonder how many will show up this year?

Entries.DialogueText: Are you all prepared for the fall? I am...
Entries.DisplayPattern: Are you all prepared for the fall? I am...

Entries.DialogueText: Huh? Oh, I bought a king size bag of pumpkin chips. You can have one, if you want.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Huh? Oh, I bought a king size bag of pumpkin chips. You can have one, if you want.

Entries.DialogueText: I've met some people who believe in spirits, and magic... but me? I've never seen anything that couldn't be explained by science.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I've met some people who believe in spirits, and magic... but me? I've never seen anything that couldn't be explained by science.

Entries.DialogueText: One benefit of the cold weather is that I can put frozen pizzas under the tree.
Entries.DisplayPattern: One benefit of the cold weather is that I can put frozen pizzas under the tree.

Entries.DialogueText: Someone's in for a real treat... {Portrait:Happy}
Entries.DisplayPattern: Someone's in for a real treat...

Entries.DialogueText: What am I thankful for?
Entries.DisplayPattern: What am I thankful for?

Entries.DialogueText: ....uh... {Portrait:Unique}
I'm thankful... that you pulled me out of the gutter. And showed me that life is worth living. {Portrait:Custom:6}
Entries.DisplayPattern: I'm thankful... that you pulled me out of the gutter. And showed me that life is worth living.

Entries.DialogueText: If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the saloon, instead...
Entries.DisplayPattern: If it was up to me, I'd probably have a pizza festival at the saloon, instead...

Entries.DialogueText: Winter can be really hard on animals. Did you install heaters in your coops and barns?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Winter can be really hard on animals. Did you install heaters in your coops and barns?

Entries.DialogueText: Remember when we sat at the old pond and shared a beer? That was around here somewhere.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Remember when we sat at the old pond and shared a beer? That was around here somewhere.

Entries.DialogueText: Well, it's best not to dwell in the past... even the good memories bring me pain.
Entries.DisplayPattern: Well, it's best not to dwell in the past... even the good memories bring me pain.

Entries.DialogueText: Oh wow, {Farmer_Name}! How'd you know this is my favorite?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh wow, ! How'd you know this is my favorite?

Entries.DialogueText: This is great! Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: This is great! Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: I don't really like this.
Entries.DisplayPattern: I don't really like this.

Entries.DialogueText: Why are you giving me your garbage?
Entries.DisplayPattern: Why are you giving me your garbage?

Entries.DialogueText: Oh, you got me something? Thanks!
Entries.DisplayPattern: Oh, you got me something? Thanks!

Entries.DialogueText: If I hadn't met you, {Farmer_Name}... I might not even be here right now.
Entries.DisplayPattern: If I hadn't met you, ... I might not even be here right now.

Entries.DialogueText: Which would be a shame, because the bird-watching up here is phenomenal! {Portrait:Happy}"/emote farmer 16/pause 1000/speak Shane "Heh... I... I tend to joke a lot, because...well... {Portrait:Sad}
